## Bio
  I am a researcher and teacher at the School of Allied Health, University of 
  Limerick. I am also a member of the Physical Activity *for* Health Research 
  Cluster at the Health Research Institute. Previously, I was based at the 
  University of Otago in Aotearoa/New Zealand.
